c74object.name: sdt.breaking~
c74object.digest: Solids interaction: Stochastic sequence of impacts to form a breaking sound.
c74object.description:
Control model for the generation of breaking phenomena.
sdt.breaking~ acts as control layer for the compound impact model formed by sdt.inertial ↔ sdt.impact~ ↔ sdt.modal.
Takes four control parameters: stored energy of the process, crushing energy spent by each micro-impact, granularity and fragmentation. Output: two audio signals [0.0, 1.0], one representing the impact velocity in m/s (leftmost outlet), and one representing the fragment size compared to the whole object size (rightmost outlet).

metadatalist.metadata: Stefano Delle Monache, Stefano Baldan, Stefano Papetti

inlet.description: Messages to the breaking object, bang starts the process.

outlet.digest: Audio signal: Impact velocity in m/s.

method.name: bang
method.digest: Inlet 0: Bang triggers a breaking event.
method.description: Inlet 0: Bang triggers a breaking event.

attribute.name: storedEnergy
attribute.description: Global energy of the process, between 0.0001 and 1000. or more

attribute.name: fragmentation
attribute.digest: Fragmentation: tendency of the object to break in smaller pieces [0.0, 1.0].
attribute.description: Fragmentation: tendency of the object to break in smaller pieces, between 0. and 1.
